channel.title: Need Help How Do I Play Peoples 508 servers
channel.description: Guys Can you Help me i never used 508 server and i dont wanna make my own 508 server i wanna play on other peoples made 508 server buy i dont know how. so please tell me how :(

item.title: Need Help How Do I Play Peoples 508 servers
item.dc:creator: @9d_n_1_n_e 9d n 1 n e
item.description:
@9d_n_1_n_e wrote:

he said play it not make his own 508 as he said 2 times.
download a 508 server from the mopar status checker and do extract and run it like you would do with any other servers.

item.title: Need Help How Do I Play Peoples 508 servers
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Skill09 Mod Skill09
item.description:
@Mod_Skill09 wrote:

well, some people might have a web client, some people might offer a download of the client, most clients don’t need to be installed it’s simply extract them to a particular location then open the batch file called “run” if you then enter the ip if it’s an ip changing client, otherwise it will connect to their erver automtically if you enter your username and pass and click log-in, if there is a problem with the client it will be in the batch file you opened, if there’s any more problems i’ll be happy to help.

Thankyou, Mod Skill09

Read full topic
